Description: Head bead. Male head in opaque dark-blue glass with suspension loop of same material. The face together with the ears is in opaque white glass. The circular eyes are outlines in dark blue with pupils of the same material. Drops of dark-green glass on the ear lobes suggest ear-rings. Central, vertical piercing.
Bibliographic references: Glass / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass in the British Museum (416)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
